notes: Instantly kills summoned units.Slow lasts 4 seconds.
desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 80% of the mana burned as physical damage. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities. Upgradable.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
